author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Brush a frying pan with a very small amount of oil and place over a medium heat. Add the pumpkin seeds, stirring frequently. They will expand and brown fairly quickly, and when this is done, place them in a bowl and add the salt, celery salt, freshly ground black  pepper and paprika. This is delicious if the pumpkin seeds are reasonably fresh.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz pumpkin seeds,  ¼ tsp celery salt,  ¼ tsp salt,  ¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper ,  ¼ tsp paprika,  1 tsp vegetable oil
